content:
We're getting to the point where I need to be informed about substantive changes to resources. Not every resource, but that ones I've done R3/R4 conversions for. Presently, this is:

  • CapabilityStatement
  • StructureDefinition
  • SearchParameter
  • MessageDefinition
  • OperationDefinition
  • CompartmentDefinition
  • StructureMap
  • GraphDefinition
  • CodeSystem
  • ValueSet
  • ConceptMap
  • NamingSystem
  • Binary
  • OperationOutcome
  • Parameters
